changeSet.sql: create table `prodlims`.`rmcasefileinfo` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `casefile_id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL, `phase` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pgst_ord_physn` BIT(1) DEFAULT NULL, `institution_id` BIGINT(20) DEFAULT NULL, `institutionaddress_id` BIGINT(20) DEFAULT NULL, `dnt_cnct_phgst` BIT(1) DEFAULT NULL, `dateofdiagnosis` DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, `hastransplanttype` BIT(1) DEFAULT NULL, `tumortype` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tumorsubtype` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tnmstage` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `has_treatment` BIT(1) DEFAULT NULL, `cancer_treatment` DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, `has_study` BIT(1) DEFAULT NULL, `recent_study` DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, `ecograting` TINYINT(1) DEFAULT NULL, `has_note_or_report` BIT(1) DEFAULT NULL, `has_pthg_report` BIT(1) DEFAULT NULL, `block_id` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `surgical_id_num` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `FK_rmcasefileinfo_casefile` FOREIGN KEY(`casefile_id`) REFERENCES `casefile` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `FK_rmcasefileinfo_institution` FOREIGN KEY (`institution_id`) REFERENCES `organization` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `FK_rmcasefileinfo_institutionaddr` FOREIGN KEY (`institutionaddress_id`) REFERENCES `contactinfo` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
